result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ga: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.orig: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.html: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.eng: The men were able to work hard.
result.ga: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.orig: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.html: Bhí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.

result.eng: She has no interest in men.
result.ga: Níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.orig: Níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.html: Níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.

result.html: Is baintreach fir éHe is a widower.
result.ponchtml: Is baintreaċ fir éHe is a widower.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
